node.html: Currently working on a personal project involving the assembly of an autonomous racing drone using the Raspberry Pi 4 (main controller of the drone), computer vision (integrated camera module allowing the drone to navigate) and the Kotlin programming language (mobile application for control).
Developed by my team at Queen Mary, UoL. An effective solution to combat air pollution in London and forwarded for consideration at the Mayors Entrepreneur Award 2019 - UK.
Developed a custom steering wheel and electronic clutch system for the Formula Student team.
